articles.content:
Ministers were accused of letting their 'mates' off quarantine today after 'high-value' business travellers were handed an exemption from self-isolation rules.

articles.title: Are gift cards and experience days a bad Christmas gift this year? - This is Money
articles.description: Although often a popular present around Christmas time, gift vouchers, gift cards and experience days are subject to expiry dates - and will become redundant should the firm they are for collapse.
articles.content:
This week has seen Arcadia go into administration and department store staple Debenhams collapse.

articles.author: Lynn Cox
articles.title: Kent's wonderful Christmas window displays - Kent Online
articles.description: It's been a tough year for independent shops but many have got into the Christmas spirit - here are some of the best festive window displays.
articles.content:
It's been a tough year for independent shops and small businesses in Kent's high streets.
